Title: Relates to pre-approved construction documents
Summary: Requires municipalities which issue building permits to provide pre-approved construction documents at no cost for the types of residential buildings permitted to be constructed in such jurisdiction.
LawCode: Amd ยง381, Exec L; add ยง28-104.1.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to directing local permitting jurisdictions to provide a catalog of pre-approved construction documents for various types of residential dwellings
